sentence.Network_en: Norway had held Holland to a scoreless draw in Rotterdam.
sentence.Network_cn: 挪威队在鹿特丹以零比零逼平荷兰队。

sentence.Network_en: The next six innings were scoreless.
sentence.Network_cn: 接下来的六局中双方均颗粒无收。

sentence.Network_en: He was benched for much of his scoreless second half.
sentence.Network_cn: 他下半场几乎是在板凳上度过的.

scarless 无疤的scoreless 无得分的seamless 无缝的

list.abs: their only slip up came in Sardinia against Cagliari , which ended in a scoreless draw .他们唯一平局是做客撒丁岛挑战卡塔尼亚的比赛。

entry.tran: (足球、棒球或其他比赛中)双方均未得分的，零比零的
entry.def: In football, baseball, and some other sports, a scoreless game is one in which neither team has scored any goals or points.

example.ex: Norway had held Holland to a scoreless draw in Rotterdam...
example.tran: 挪威队在鹿特丹以零比零逼平荷兰队。

example.ex: The next six innings were scoreless.
example.tran: 接下来的六局中双方均颗粒无收。
